about_us_section.title: About Us
about_us_section.description: We always put customer satisfaction first and are committed to providing thoughtful service to every customer.

business_intro.p1: To fully support our customers' car life, we have developed various businesses.
business_intro.p2: With "Trust", "Peace of Mind", and "High Quality" as our motto, we will continue to provide satisfying services to our customers.
business_intro.p3: We sincerely look forward to your visit.

why_choose_us.title: Why Choose Us?

high_quality.title: High Quality

AboutPage.hero_subtitle: Your trusted automotive partner, providing professional and reliable one-stop car services
AboutPage.company_philosophy_subtitle: Customer-centric, delivering premium automotive service experiences
AboutPage.company_philosophy_quote: "A car is not just a means of transportation, but an important partner in enriching life. We adhere to the 'Customer First' philosophy, through used car sales, acquisition, and maintenance services, committed to providing you with a safe and comfortable automotive life. We believe that sincere service and professional technology are the foundation of earning customer trust."
AboutPage.business_intro_subtitle: Comprehensive support for your automotive life
AboutPage.used_car_description: We offer fair prices based on market value for used car acquisition, carefully selecting quality vehicles for our customers. We promise high-price acquisition, quick assessment, and secure transactions.
AboutPage.rental_service_description: From short-term to long-term, we provide vehicles suitable for various purposes at reasonable prices to meet your different travel needs.
AboutPage.maintenance_description: Our team of experienced professional technicians provides meticulous maintenance and repair services for your beloved car, ensuring your comfortable driving experience.
AboutPage.car_inspection_subtitle: In-house certified factory, professional technician services
AboutPage.car_inspection_description: At our own certified factory, professional technicians provide comprehensive car inspection and maintenance services. We offer various options from high-standard maintenance to economical maintenance based on different customer needs.
AboutPage.body_paint_description: Body paint is a professional service that repairs car scratches and dents, restoring the original aesthetic condition through painting. From small scratches to large-area damage, we provide high-quality repair services to protect the value of your car.
AboutPage.after_sales_description: We provide reliable after-sales service protection after purchase. Regular inspections, oil changes, warranty services, etc., fully support your automotive life. You can also consult anytime for inspections and malfunctions.
AboutPage.etc_install_description: We provide professional ETC device installation services. From selecting the right ETC device for your vehicle to installation and registration, we offer one-stop services to make your travel more convenient.
AboutPage.acquisition_features_subtitle: High-price acquisition, quick assessment, secure transactions
AboutPage.fast_assessment_description: Assessment completed in just minutes, with acquisition price provided on the spot. If all necessary documents are complete, cash conversion can be done on the same day. No waiting for appointments, smooth and stress-free process.
AboutPage.high_price_acquisition_description: Because we value your beloved car, we maximize its value assessment. Based on market data, we offer fair prices, never losing to competitors' high-price acquisitions.
AboutPage.secure_transaction_description: Comprehensive transaction process, transparent price assessment, allowing you to entrust your car to us with peace of mind. Our professional team ensures every step is safe and reliable.
AboutPage.contact_us_subtitle: Feel free to contact us anytime, we will serve you wholeheartedly
AboutPage.contact_form_info: Consultation is also available via phone and dedicated form
